column4: Hello. I just installed 12.04 amd64 on my desktop and it didn't automatically add Windows to grub. How can I fix that?
from a terminal try "sudo update-grub" and see if it automatically adds it.
I ran that and it said it found a linux, initrd, and memtest86+ image, but it doesn't look like it found Windows.
sorry man, that's my only suggestion.  good luck.
